content.webTitle: Janet, Liam and Slowthai in his pants: Saturday at Glastonbury

fields.headline: Janet, Liam and Slowthai in his pants: Saturday at Glastonbury
fields.bodyText: On the hottest day of the year, festivalgoers made the most of the sunshine despite long queues at the taps and some showers closing down. From Janet Jackson’s Pyramid stage set to impromptu dips, here are the best photos from Saturday: Janet Jackson ruling the Pyramid stage. Liam Gallagher invites the BBC’s cameras to come and ‘ave a go. Resplendent in boxers: Slowthai performing on West Holts. Out here getting juice: Lizzo on West Holts. Photos: Neil Hall/EPA, Leon Neil/Getty, Henry Nicholls/Reuters, Absolutely nothing troubling whatsoever about this Lewis Capaldi fan’s demonstration of their ardour. And, Anne-Marie summing up the scale of her Pyramid stage set. Freaky dancing during the Chemical Brothers’ Other stage show. An envoy group from Glastonbury-on-Sea, perhaps. A sleek Skye Edwards of Morcheeba. Shelter was at a premium during the fierce Saturday afternoon heatwave.
